content.raw: ign-rendering’s mesh manager is using ign-common’s `SystemPath` to find files but it does not recognize `model://` anymore as we decided that it’s gazebo specific. So we may have to process the mesh filename string ourselves first, [possibly here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/7955e01d76e7181726622b126947bb8dd43128d1/examples/gazebo_scene_viewer/SceneManager.cc#lines-1487) in SceneManager, before loading the mesh. For reference, [this](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/782da195da5dbd45da7ed13558b2521addda650d/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc#lines-307) is how gazebo finds `model://` files. We would also need to read the `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH` env var and store the list of search paths.

So we may have to process the mesh filename string ourselves first, possibly here in SceneManager, before loading the mesh. For reference, this is how gazebo finds model:// files. We would also need to read the GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH env var and store the list of search paths.
